title: Looking for ONE HOF Hindu, Am Beauty, Car. Brights OR Tolstoi backs
author: Stetson_1883

posts.post_title: Looking for ONE HOF Hindu, Am Beauty, Car. Brights OR Tolstoi backs
posts.post_content:
I'm collecting the backs and am looking for almost any HOFer with a Hindu, Am B, Tolstoi or Carolina Brights back. They MUST be graded at a 3.5, 4, maybe 5. Anything higher would prolly be too expensive.

Lenox, Broad Leaf and Uzit would also be nice and would NOT need to be HOFers.

Please feel free to send PM with scans and reasonable prices. Danke.
